009package imagingbook.common.mser;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
013import imagingbook.common.math.Eigensolver2x2;
014import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
015
016/**
017 * TODO: Move to BinaryRegion!
018 * @author WB
019 *
020 */
021public abstract class Utils {
022        
023        public static GeometricEllipse makeEllipse(BinaryRegion r) {
024                final double n = r.getSize();
025                Pnt2d xc = r.getCenter();
026                double[] moments = r.getCentralMoments(); // = (mu20, mu02, mu11)
027                final double mu20 = moments[0];
028                final double mu02 = moments[1];
029                final double mu11 = moments[2];
030                
031                Eigensolver2x2 es = new Eigensolver2x2(mu20, mu11, mu11, mu02);
032                double ra = 2 * Math.sqrt(es.getRealEigenvalue(0) / n); // correct (see Book p.238)
033                double rb = 2 * Math.sqrt(es.getRealEigenvalue(1) / n);
034                double[] x0 = es.getEigenvector(0).toArray();
035                double theta = Math.atan2(x0[1], x0[0]);
036                return new GeometricEllipse(ra, rb, xc.getX(), xc.getY(), theta);
037        }
038
039}
